import { useContext } from 'react' import { useFetch } from '../../Utils/useFetch' import './Cart.css' import { ShopContext } from '../Context/ShopContext' export const CartProduct = ( { product } ) =>{ //console.log(product) const { removeFromCart } = useContext(ShopContext) const checkedOrNot = (e) =>{ if(e.target.checked){ console.log('asdasda') } } return(

{product.title}

{/* Quantidade: */}

R$:{product.price},00

) }
